channel.title: Portals
channel.description:
Ok i made my own server then my friend asked to combine his server with mine...so we did his is in catherby and mines in entrana, we made 1 starting place in edgeville bank, i was wondering how do i put a portal in edgeville bank to make 1 go to entrana and the other to catherby, please tell me everything
thanks old_nite

item.title: Portals
item.dc:creator: @old_nite old_nite
item.description:
@old_nite wrote:

i need a tut badly please if theres a tut please post link, any site that has it idc doesnt have to be moparisthebest.com

Read full topic

item.title: Portals
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

just ge the object id’s for the portals make cases for each of them and make it so 1 portal tele’s you to one place and the othe rportal the other place in the cases also add the portals in your Addglobalobjects if you haven’t already

Read full topic
